backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor defining data types (Article, XPost, Spotlight, Wisdom, Resource) and CRUD operations for managing ICP ecosystem content with blob storage integration for images.
feature_evidence.json: Empty feature evidence report with no features documented.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Pre-existing summaries of frontend components describing React Query hooks, dialog forms, and display components with explicit white text styling for dark mode visibility.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with OKLCH color system defining light and dark theme variables including background, foreground, card, and accent colors.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point for the React application with title 'Connect the Dots.ICP' and root div mounting point.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React component with tab-based navigation rendering different content sections (progress, xposts, spotlight, wisdom, resources, cybercrime) with hero header and footer.
frontend/src/components/AddArticleDialog: Dialog form component for adding articles with title, URL, and thumbnail upload, featuring comprehensive logging, progress tracking, and mutation handling with toast notifications.
frontend/src/components/AddCybercrimeArt: Dialog form component for adding cybercrime articles with title, URL, and thumbnail upload, including upload progress tracking and error handling.
frontend/src/components/AddResourceDialo: Dialog component for adding trusted ICP ecosystem resources with name, description, and URL fields. Handles form submission via useAddResource hook and displays loading/success states.
frontend/src/components/AddSpotlightDial: Dialog component for adding ecosystem spotlight entries with title and content fields. Uses useAddSpotlight hook for submission with toast notifications and loading states.
Dialog component for adding investing wisdom quotes with quote and author fields. Submits via useAddWisdom hook with validation and toast feedback.
frontend/src/components/AddXPostDialog.t: Dialog component for uploading X post screenshots with optional description. Handles image file upload with progress tracking using ExternalBlob and useAddXPost hook.
frontend/src/components/CybercrimeAwaren: Displays a grid of cybercrime awareness articles with thumbnails and external links. Fetches data via useGetAllCybercrimeArticles and includes add article dialog functionality.
frontend/src/components/EcosystemSpotlig: Displays a list of ICP ecosystem spotlight entries with titles, content, and timestamps. Fetches spotlights via useGetAllSpotlights hook and includes add spotlight dialog.
Displays a grid of motivational investing quotes with author attribution, featuring add/empty state handling and loading skeletons.
frontend/src/components/LatestProgress.t: Shows a grid of ICP progress articles with thumbnails, titles, and external links, including add dialog and loading states.
frontend/src/components/NavigationMenu.t: Dropdown menu component with six navigation items (Progress, X Posts, Spotlight, Wisdom, Resources, Cybercrime) using icons and active state highlighting.
frontend/src/components/TrustedResources: Displays trusted ICP ecosystem people/resources in a card grid with name, description, and profile links.
frontend/src/components/XPosts.tsx: Gallery component for displaying X (Twitter) post screenshots with optional descriptions in a responsive grid layout.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React Query hook that creates and manages the backend actor instance, handling authentication state and invalidating dependent queries on identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context provider and hook for Internet Identity authentication, managing login/logout flow, identity persistence, and authentication status states.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React Query hooks for CRUD operations on articles, X posts, spotlights, wisdom quotes, resources, and cybercrime articles. Includes extensive console logging for debugging mutations and queries.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables for light/dark theme using OKLCH color space with ICP-themed futuristic styling. Ensures input text visibility with explicit foreground colors.
frontend/src/main.tsx: React application entry point that sets up QueryClient, InternetIdentityProvider, and renders the root App component.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending default theme with custom OKLCH colors, glow shadows, custom fonts (Inter, JetBrains Mono), and animation keyframes for accordion and pulse effects.
project_state.json: Project metadata tracking a known issue where user content is lost when draft apps expire and redeploy. Feature request AR-1 aims to restore all user-added content after expiration.
